commit.message:
Remove rustboot-related logging hacks

(Also, feel free to start adding logging to your code. Really. It's fast.)

files.patch:
@@ -51,9 +51,7 @@ upcall_kill
 upcall_log_double
 upcall_log_float
 upcall_log_int
-upcall_log_int_rustboot
 upcall_log_str
-upcall_log_str_rustboot
 upcall_malloc
 upcall_mark
 upcall_new_chan
